body_html: I believe a sufficient API would be a .new() method and a .param_shape property. The current code uses a few other methods and attributes like .is_cuda but I believe .new() and .param_shape should suffice. It seems preferable to me to expose Dist.new() rather than Dist.param.new() to avoid giving the impression that .param was in any way a complete parameterization.

body: I believe a sufficient API would be a `.new()` method and a `.param_shape` property. The current code uses a few other methods and attributes like `.is_cuda` but I believe `.new()` and `.param_shape` should suffice. It seems preferable to me to expose `Dist.new()` rather than `Dist.param.new()` to avoid giving the impression that `.param` was in any way a complete parameterization.
